title: Live From Tampa!
description:
Robert Reed, Jessica Pepper and Paul Wilborn share stories about a hate crime, an accident, and an almost homeless poet.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Cure, Robert Reed, Jessica Pepper, Glen Phillips, Paul Wilborn, Belly, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
